# Script Parser {#Automatic Script Parsing Tool}

#### Keywords {-}

pilot, script, nlp

## Why parse scripts?

The success of an entertainment studio is based on finding content that is unique and original. A successful studio will receive literally hundreds of scripts per week 
pitched by content creators and film makers.

## Old School Hollywood meets New School Tech

Advances in NLP can change the way scripts have been traditionally evaluated. The application of Information Extraction methods can search for patterns in pilot scripts and
automatically extract useful information from them.


## A Work in Progress

There will be challenges along the way. We do not expect this to be a turn-key solution.
